mapper.select:
select id, school_id, student_name, paper_id, paper_name, date, single_mark, double_mark,judge_mark, mark from t_grade where 1=1

and paper_name like concat('%', #{paper_name},'%')
and student_name like concat('%', #{student_name},'%')
